>Hi,
>
>Is there a way I can add HTTP headers to the crawl? In particular I
>would like to add an Accept-Language: header --- several of the sites
>I want to crawl push English content by default unless told that the
>site is wants Arabic.
>  
>
No.  There isn't but sounds like a necessary feature.  I'll add a RFE.
